text: Phyllis Jeanne Somerville (December 12, 1943 – July 16, 2020) was an American actress. She was best known for her roles in Little Children (2006), The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008), Surviving Family (2012), The Big C (2010–2013), and Outsiders (2016–2017). Somerville died on July 16, 2020 in New York City, aged 76. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Iowa Category:Actors from Iowa City, Iowa
title: Phyllis Somerville
